text: This is a list of Brazilian television related events from 1958. ==Events== *29 June - Brazil beat Sweden 5-2 to win the 1958 World Cup at Solna, Sweden. ==Debuts== ==Television shows== ==Births== *29 March - Pedro Bial, TV host, producer, director, writer & journalist ==Deaths== ==See also== *1958 in Brazil
title: 1958 in Brazilian television
